items.sentence: Tom doesn\'t want an iPad. He wants a portable device that supports Flash.
Tom hadn\'t washed dishes in a week, so the sink was full of dirty dishes.
Tom is having trouble coping with the fact that his son committed suicide.
Tom sent Mary a love letter, but he never did find out whether it arrived.
I didn\'t know that you were sick, so I didn\'t visit you in the hospital.
